name: Here we go again
description:
You have to solve puzzles in a limited amount of time.

And everytime the timer runs out, your past self plays the level again, along with you!

Have your past self execute the right choreography and you will solve the puzzle!

This game was created for the game plus jam (the theme is time)

There are 5 levels (when you finish the 5th level, you just go back to the main menu)

Also there is no music in the game, only sound effects, so feel free to stream your music in the background while you play the game.

And here is a making of :

Controls : 

WASD - movement

Spacebar - jump

Left mouse button - interact

R - reset the level

Esc - open the menu
